metadata.title: CVE-2021-46141 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in uriparser before 0.9.6. It performs invalid freeoperations in uriFreeUriMembers and uriMakeOwner.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46141` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liburiparser1 - 0.9.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: uriparser package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.6').
